Package cofh.lib.capability

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IArcheryAmmoItem
    Implement this interface as a capability for a Quiver item which should be compatible with CoFH's improved archery handling.
    IArcheryBowItem
    Implement this interface as a capability for a Bow Item which should be compatible with CoFH's improved archery handling.
    IArcheryItem  
    IAreaEffect
    Implement this interface as a capability for an Item which should be compatible with CoFH's AOE overlay rendering/handling.
    IEnchantableItem
    Implement this interface as a capability for Items which have explicit enchantment support.
    IShieldItem  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapabilityArchery  
    CapabilityAreaEffect  
    CapabilityEnchantableItem  
    CapabilityShieldItem
